SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN aa.property_type = '停车位' THEN ( SELECT dd.`no` FROM r_parking_space dd WHERE aa.property_id = dd.id AND dd.is_delete = 0 ) else ( SELECT cc.roomNo FROM v_room_roomNo cc WHERE aa.property_id = cc.id AND cc.is_delete = 0 ) END as NO, bb.NAME ruleName, cc.name comp_name, dd.name comm_name, aa.* FROM f_bill aa, f_cost_rule bb, s_company cc, r_community dd ${ew.customSqlSegment} and aa.cost_rule_id = bb.id and aa.comp_id = cc.id and aa.comm_id = dd.id AND bb.is_delete = 0
